entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 5:08 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending late this evening then a few clouds. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h diminishing to 30 late this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
